titles.title: A bill to amend section 2(11) of the National Labor Relations Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 3/31/1987--Introduced. Amends the National Labor Relations Act to provide for the following exception under the definition of "supervisor." Prohibits deeming any faculty member or group of faculty members in any educational institution to be managerial or supervisory employees solely because they participate in decisions with respect to courses, curriculum, personnel, budget, or other matters of educational policy.
